event.title: Highest temperature in Chicago on Sep 17, 2024?

markets.subtitle: 80° or below
markets.rules_primary: If the highest temperature recorded at Chicago Midway, IL for September 17, 2024, is less than 81° according to the NWS's Daily Climate Report, then the market resolves to Yes.
markets.rules_secondary:
Please be advised to check to see what temperatures have occurred previously in the day. While the market resolves based on the finalized report from the NWS, traders should use other data sources--including other preliminary NWS reporting--to inform their trades.

The Last Trading Time will be 11:59 PM ET on September 17, 2024 regardless of any data releases or events occurring. Expiration will occur on the sooner of the first 7:00 or 8:00
AM ET following the release of the data for September 17, 2024, or one week after September 17, 2024.

As a reminder, the Underlying is not the NWS NOWData data source. As noted in the Rulebook, for the actual Underlying, please go to the Source Agency link, click on "Observed Weather", then choose "Chicago Midway, IL".
